name: Humongous Punch
description:
This is my first project in Godot, its a simple 2d platformer but with the mechanic of using your fists to punch the enemies and dashing to travel in the level. If you enjoy the game or at least you laugh, think in support of my next projects with a donation. 

Controls:

left and right key to move 

X or Y to punch

hold X or Y to dash

Space to jump

down key to refresh the energy bar

hold X or Y and jump to make a dash in the air
